MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-JAN-2021 16:17.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan affecting properties in Nantyfelin Road, Terrace Walk, Upper Mill Road and surrounding area. At the request of the gas board we have isolated supplies form safety whilst they work on a gas leak in the area. As soon as we have confirmation that it is safe we will restore your electricity supply as quickly as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:27pm on 18th January 2021.
